dentist to show you a

• Avoid having sugary drinks 
and foods too often. Try to 
eat them at mealtimes only.
• Go to the dentist for a 
check-up. HSC dental 
treatment is free while you 
are pregnant and for a year 
after your baby’s birth.
• Ask your dentist if any new 
or	replacement	fillings	
should be delayed until 
after your baby is born.
Tiredness
In the early months of 
pregnancy you may feel 
tired or even desperat
